text: Edward James Tonks ( â€“ 18 October 2020) was a New Zealand businessman and sports administrator. He was chair of the New Zealand Rugby Football Union (NZRFU) between 1990 and 1995. He also chaired the International Rugby Board (IRB). Tonks died at his home in Wellington on 18 October 2020, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand businesspeople Category:New Zealand sportspeople Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Eddie Tonks
